results.title: Metformin: new applications for an old drug.
results.text_hl: There is evidence of the beneficial effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@, early-stage @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@prostate cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Urethral_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D014523 @@@urothelial cancer@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@blood cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@, and @DISEASE_Bone_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001859 @@@bone cancer@@@, suggesting @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a potent anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ agent.

results.title: Metformin: the hidden chronicles of a magic drug.
results.text_hl: It also delays aging and is effective in aging related disorders and is equally effective in @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ related disorders at least in different rodent studies. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@'s major effect has been shown in various @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancers@@@ ranging from solid to @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@hematological malignancies@@@.

results.title: Negative regulation of the LKB1/AMPK pathway by ERK in human acute myeloid leukemia cells.
results.text_hl: Several studies have revealed that the activation of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ by chemical stimulators, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, induces apoptosis in a variety of @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@hematologic malignant@@@ cells.

results.title: Metformin inhibits cell proliferation in SKM-1 cells via AMPK-mediated cell cycle arrest.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a widely used antidiabetic drug, has previously been demonstrated to exert anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ effects in certain @<m>DISEASE_Hematologic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019337 @@@hematological malignancies@@@, but its effects on the transformation of @DISEASE_Myelodysplastic_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D009190 @@@myelodysplastic syndromes@@@ to @DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid_Acute @DISEASE_MESH:D015470 @@@acute myeloid leukemia@@@ (@DISEASE_Leukemia_Myeloid_Acute @DISEASE_MESH:D015470 @@@AML-@@@@DISEASE_Myelodysplastic_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D009190 @@@MDS@@@) remain unclear.
